attributes.action: Make it Law that all pets should be licenced,and people working with animals and in animal stores must have qualificfications to do so.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People working with animals and in animal stores must have qualifications to do so, and that all animal stores, shelters, and businesses should be inspected to make sure that the animals are being cared for correctly.
Also all animals must have a licence, which should be renewed every year, one licence for each pet owned, the owner must have enough knowledge of how to care for the animal before receiving a licence to buy such an animal.
This might help to prevent cruelty, over breeding and homeless animals.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
